context: Article 6.12 (1) of the Regional Planning Act (Wro) requires the establishment of an operating plan for a zoning plan in the case of a 'building plan'. Article 6.2.1 of the Spatial Planning Decision (Bro) describes what a 'building plan' is. In the light of Article 6.2.1 of the Spatial Planning Decision, this constitutes a 'building plan' for which an exploitation plan should in principle be established.
The City Council of Halderberge is obliged to recover the costs and an operating plan if there is a 'building plan'.

The cost recovery of the sites which are not currently owned by the municipality is regulated by the operating plan (public road), in so far as it refers to a 'building plan' within the meaning of Article 6.2.1 Spatial Planning Decision (Bro).
Spatial Planning Act (Wro) requires the municipality of Halderberge to recover the costs and an operating plan if there is a 'building plan'.
